subject: Re: [junit] hello
msgSnippet: ... Do you mean the Ant task ? There are XSL stylesheets that you can change. The  task allows you to specify the stylesheet you want
messageBody:
shyam wrote:

> 1.how should i change the format of the report
> that the Junit generates.

Do you mean the Ant task <junitreport>?

There are XSL stylesheets that you can change. The <junitreport> task
allows you to specify the stylesheet you want to use. Look at the Ant
documentation or _JUnit Recipes_ (chapter 5) for details.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
